name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pillar - Embed Media Kit or Talent Roster

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly embed your Pillar Media Kit or Talent Roster directly in Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our Pillar Chrome extension designed to seamlessly integrate MediaKit and Talent List Block functionalities directly into your Gmail experience. With this innovative extension, managing media kits and talent lists becomes effortless, streamlining your workflow and enhancing productivity. Say goodbye to unnecessary tabs and interruptions.
